H0.text: Which shocking fish is also known as a torpedo. Electric Eel

H1.text: Which shocking fish is also known as a torpedo. Electric Ray

H2.text: Which shocking fish is also known as a torpedo. Stargazer

H3.text: Which shocking fish is also known as a torpedo. Torpedofish

A4.text: the torpedo undersea weapon is named after it

A5.text: the name comes from the Latin torpere, 'to be stiffened or paralyzed', from the effect on someone who touches the fish
